name: hnsqlite (jiggy-ai)

genes.title: 使用方法
genes.content:
To use `hnsqlite`, you can create a new collection, add items to it, and perform search operations. Here's an example:


```python
from hnsqlite import Collection
import numpy as np

name: hnsqlite/hnsqlite 模块
description: [模块级] hnsqlite 项目的 hnsqlite 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/jiggy-ai/hnsqlite

genes.title: hnsqlite 模块说明
genes.content: `hnsqlite` is a text-centric integration of SQLite and [Hnswlib](https://github.com/nmslib/hnswlib) to provide a persistent collection of embeddings (strings, vectors, and metadata) and search time filtering based on the metadata.
